title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 376/96 of 29 February 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 897/94 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2847/93 as regards pilot projects relating to continuous position monitoring of Community fishing vessels
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 376/96 of 29 February 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 897/94 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2847/93 as regards pilot projects relating to continuous position monitoring of Community fishing vessels
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation enters into force the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 February 1996.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 261, 20. 10. 1993, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 301, 14. 12. 1995, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 301, 14. 12. 1995, p. 35.
(4) OJ No L 104, 23. 4. 1994, p. 18.
